template.subject: Action Required: Reminder New Assessment / Evaluation Task
template.body:
Dear %TARGET_FIRSTNAME% %TARGET_LASTNAME%,
An assessment or evaluation task currently available for you to complete (or delegate) in MEdTech Central has not yet been finished. To proceed, please click the following link:
%ENTRADA_URL%/assessments
As a refresher your username is %USERNAME%, and if you have any trouble remembering your password you can reset it by clicking the following link, and entering %EMAIL% as your e-mail address.
%ENTRADA_URL%/password_reset
If you have received this email on an earlier date, please be advised that the link to this delegation task has been revised, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
If you have any questions about the assessment/evaluation tasks in your task list, please contact your program administrator for assistance.
Regards,
The %APPLICATION_NAME% team
